tool.name: HUMAnN_renorm_table

param.name: units
param.label: Normalization scheme: copies per million [cpm], relative abundance [relab]

param.name: Normalize
param.label: Normalize all levels by [community] total or [levelwise] totals

param.name: s
param.label: Include the special features UNMAPPED, UNINTEGRATED, and UNGROUPED

tool.help:
Normalize HUMAnN's default RPK values prior to performing statistical analyses.
**Input** =========
Input consists of output from the HUMAnN step
**Output** ===========
Normalized table in tsv format
